sentences.cn: “ 人们都尊重你, ” 海丝特说.

sentences.en: As I close the book, love and reverence possess me.
sentences.cn: 当我读讫掩卷的时候,一种爱慕与崇敬之情,使我不能自已.

sentences.en: As I closed the book, love and reverence possessed me.
sentences.cn: 当我读讫掩卷的时候,一种爱慕与崇敬之情使我不能自己.

sentences.en: Children are taught to show respect and reverence towards their grandparents.
sentences.cn: 人们教育孩子要尊敬祖父母.

sentences.en: He is still held in great reverence throughout the country.
sentences.cn: 他仍受全国人民的崇敬.

sentences.en: He made us a profound reverence as we entered.
sentences.cn: 我们进去时,他向我们深表敬意.

sentences.en: He was a bishop who was held in reverence by all.
sentences.cn: 他是一位被大家都尊敬的主教.

sentences.en: I had a theoretical reverence and homage for beauty, elegance, gallantry, fascination.
sentences.cn: 我对于美 、 文雅 、 勇敢 、 魅力,抱有一种理论上的崇敬.

sentences.en: Mr. Manners is a person I hold in reverence.
sentences.cn: 曼纳斯先生是我所崇敬的人.

sentences.en: Pity, reverence and tenderness seemed struggling together in her breast.
sentences.cn: 同情 、 尊重和怜爱一时都涌上她的心头.

sentences.en: Royalty is regarded with unquestioned reverence.
sentences.cn: 王室成员毫无争议地受到尊重。

sentences.en: The old man attained great reverence from the young men.
sentences.cn: 这位老人在青年人中享有极高威望.

sentences.en: The poem conveys his deep reverence for nature.
sentences.cn: 这首诗表达了他对大自然的深深崇敬之情。

sentences.en: We reverence tradition but will not be enfettered by it.
sentences.cn: 我们尊重传统，但不被传统所束缚。

sentences.en: We reverence tradition but will not be fettered by it.
sentences.cn: 我们尊重传统,但不被传统所束缚.

sentences.en: We stand together now in mutual support and in reverence for the dead.
sentences.cn: 出于相互支持和对逝者的敬意，我们现在站到了一起。

words.tran_cn: 虔诚的；表示尊敬的；可尊敬的

trans.tran_cn: 尊敬，敬畏，敬礼，受尊敬，尊严
trans.tran_en: great respect and admiration for someone or something
